paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the Thr60Ala variant in the TTR gene, including penetrance data and individual case details.

patients.phenotype: transthyretin amyloidosis with recurrent stroke-like episodes and fluctuating mental status

individual_records.phenotype_details: CNS TTR amyloidosis with leptomeningeal disease
individual_records.evidence_sentence: A 31-year-old woman with transthyretin (TTR) amyloidosis secondary to a Thr60Ala mutation developed recurrent stroke-like episodes with fluctuating mental status.

functional_data.summary: The Thr60Ala mutation is associated with CNS TTR amyloidosis.

variants.additional_notes: This is the first documented case of leptomeningeal disease secondary to a Thr60Ala mutation in the TTR gene.
key_quotes: This is the first documented case of leptomeningeal disease secondary to a Thr60Ala mutation in the TTR gene.

extraction_metadata.notes: Full text was available, allowing for detailed extraction.
